CheckTitle: Ensure that bucket policies do not over-trust AWS services without restrictions.
Description: This check verifies that S3 bucket policies are configured in a way that limits access to the intended AWS accounts only, preventing unauthorized access by external or unintended accounts.
Risk: Allowing other AWS accounts to perform actions via AWS Services as 'confused deputies' can cause data leakage or impose additional costs.

Recommendation.Text: Review and update your S3 bucket policies to remove permissions that grant AWS services access unless they are restricted by a Condition limiting to a source account, org or orgpath
